short_description: A volcanic archipelago off Africa's east coast, Comoros is known for its perfumed plant life, pristine beaches, and the active Mount Karthala volcano.

alcohol_info: Alcohol is strictly regulated due to Islamic culture
Consumption is prohibited in public areas
Available in some hotels and licensed restaurants for non-Muslims

tipping.hotels: Small tips for porters are appreciated
tipping.restaurants: 10% if service charge is not included
tipping.taxis: Not expected but rounding up is appreciated

weather.title: Comoros has a tropical maritime climate with two main seasons: a hot, humid, and rainy season, and a cooler, drier season.

when_to_visit.title: Dry Season
when_to_visit.short_description: The best time to visit with cooler temperatures and less rain, perfect for outdoor activities.

when_to_visit.title: Wet Season
when_to_visit.short_description: Hot and humid with frequent heavy rains and possible cyclones.

when_to_visit.title: Turtle Watching
when_to_visit.short_description: Ideal time to see Green Turtles nesting on Moheli.

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Comoros is during the dry season from May to October for pleasant weather and outdoor exploration.
